works.description:
Another website I have found is using the same images, HTML and text as our website. Some of the passages of text are exactly the same as on our website. For example on the homepage the following passage of text 

"Castle Coast Campers provides an exceptional service for everyone looking to hire a VW camper, from the initial booking right through to the end of your camping adventure. We offer pick up and drop off from local airports and nearby train stations for free and will equip the campers with everthing you need to ensure your experience of camping remains glamorous. "

Is this same as on our website, apart from the name of the company. Which is this:

"Cornish Campers provides an exceptional service for everyone looking to hire a VW camper, from the initial booking right through to the end of your camping adventure. We offer pick up and drop off from Newquay airport and nearby train stations for free and will equip the campers with everthing you need to ensure your experience of camping remains glamorous. "

The HTML on our website was written by me adn I created all the images (including the navigation menu buttons) and these have been duplicated. I think they are actually the exact same images.
